name: Generation Equity Advisors
tag_list: mergers, acquisitions, investment-bank, investment-banker, los-angeles, technology-mergers, software-mergers
overview:
We are an investment banking firm focused exclusively on mergers and acquisitions for the Technology and Digital Media industry sectors.

Our professionals have completed over $20 billion in transactions to date and have experience in investment banking and capital markets from leading firms. They are experts in complex transactions of most shapes and sizes.

We advise companies, majority shareholders and leading institutions on complex strategic and financial transactions including mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, asset sales, spin-offs and related corporate finance issues that create and increase shareholder value.

Our M&A process helps to achieve maximum success and value for our clients.

We operate without conflicts of interests unlike the larger investment banking firms and do not trade in securities or provide investment research. We are independent and specialize in offering focused advice on technology and digital media industry specific mergers & acquisitions.

We operate with a global view and advise companies strictly within our industry expertise.
